title.value: UK Core Person Marital Status Wales

description.value: A set of codes that define the marital status of a person, as specified by the person. These codes and their descriptions represent concepts used in Wales and are copied from the content of the [Digital Health and Care Wales](https://dhcw.nhs.wales/information-services/information-standards/data-standards/data-standards-files/data-standard-change-notices-docs/dscns-2020/20200622-dscn-2020-06-core-reference-data-d2-3-pdf) web page on 17/11/2022.
